abstract_ssm: This collection contains the Society of Samoset, Inc., a social club for young men founded in the Bedford-Stuyvesant neighborhood of Brooklyn in 1912. The collection includes the club's constitution and bylaws, a handwritten essay about the Samoset Baseball Club of 1912-1919, a 60th anniversary program containing a typewritten history of the Society, and a description of the club's initiation rituals.
geogname_ssm: Brooklyn (New York, N.Y.) -- Social life and customs -- 20th century

place_sim: Brooklyn (New York, N.Y.) -- Social life and customs -- 20th century
